text.value: You cannot leave Start or End dates blank.
You cannot leave Start date blank.
Date cannot be in the past.
End date cannot be before Start date.
Start and End date cannot be the same date and End date cannot be in the past.
Subscription Start date cannot be before effective Start date

The system cannot calculate the next billing cycle after the given start date for this subscription because it is too far in the future or past. You can either adjust the start date or make it an absolute date.

The system cannot calculate the next billing cycle after the given end date for this subscription because it is too far in the future or past. You can either adjust the end date or make it an absolute date.
If no Start date, then End date must be after today.
If no End date, then Start date cannot be in the past.
End Date cannot be before Start date.
Start and End date cannot be the same date.
Invalid time format. An example of a valid time is (YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:SS).
WARNING-Start Date is in the past. Press OK again to confirm.
WARNING-End Date is in the past. Press OK again to confirm.
